entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (2)20171115
I completed the first quest and did a bunch of fun grinding in the
process. It is so fun to fight monsters! I am very nervous I won't
be able to unlock every skill in the game because I have so few
and I'm already level 10.

Total time: 2:20
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 1 - Episode 10 - Fire and Blood (4)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 1 - Episode 10 - Fire and Blood (4)20171113
This episode is strange because it is all just fallout and it
doesn't seem that important within the episode, but everything
has a huge consequence: Bran's dream foreshadows his whole story;
Jaime's wallowing in prison is step one in his journey of
redemption; Robb's acceptance of being the King in the North will
lead to his death; Tyrion will finally grow up as the Hand of the
King; Arya is going on a totally different path now; Sansa will
start being tortured by man after man; Jon has left the South
behind; and Dany has DRAGONS!
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 18 - Booster
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 18 - Booster20171107
I enjoyed the continued story of Clark being a doof. Booster Gold
is such a funny character. I thought Blue Beetle wasn't developed
enough.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 19 - Dominion
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 19 - Dominion20171107
This was a really stupid episode and just an excuse to bring Zod
in. The only good part was how Lois reacted given that he had
been gone for weeks. That was really cool.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 20 - Prophecy
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 20 - Prophecy20171107
This was a very fun episode, especially because Kara was around
and the two leads got to see what it was like in the others'
shoes. I didn't like Lois' reaction, but I can see why it is
dramatically useful. The fake table of villains sucked.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 21 - Finale
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 21 - Finale20171107
There were parts of this that were great, like the romancey stuff
at the start of the episode. On the other hand, there were lame
parts like how old people were trotted out just for fan
service. I would have liked to see some more of Superman, but
I've learned to be let down by the show. It was a nice finish,
but I'm very glad it is over. The framing of Chloe reading to her
son was fun.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Baelor (4)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 1 - Episode 9 - Baelor (4)20171106
Ned's words are so amazing, "You think I consider my life a
valuable thing?" and "I learned to die a long time ago." Oh man,
I nearly cried. The conversation between Jon and Aemon to also be
pretty awesome too. I was also really impressed by the great
scenes between Bronn and Tyrion. It is amazing how much in Dany's
life started happening just because of a bunch of accidents.

Ned Stark: ``You think my life is some precious thing to me? That
I would trade my honour for a few more years of...of what? You
grew up with actors, you learned their craft and you learnt it
well. But I grew up with soldiers. I learned how to die a long
time ago.''

It was great too how Arya and Yoren interacted.
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 14 - Masquerade
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 14 - Masquerade20171106
I really enjoyed the way that Desaad tried to convert Chloe... it
was very believable and cool. I thought it was very obvious that
Oliver was converted, although it appears to have not mattered,
given that he moves in just a few episodes. I love the idea that
Clark is the secret identity and he's starting to implement it.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 15 - Fortune
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 15 - Fortune20171106
This was a really stupid episode. It's one of those "theme"
episodes that tries to do what another movie does. The premise is
pretty funny, it's a thing I believe Zatanna would do, but the
revelry in people doing bad things is dumb.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 16 - Scion
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 16 - Scion20171106
I thought this one was really great. I like the Conner character
and the relationship that he starts having with Clark. Tess's
scene with Lionel at the end was great too. It is crazy to think
back about who Tess was at the beginning and how great she
is. Lionel being visited by Darkseid seems to not actually
matter.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 17 - Kent
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 17 - Kent20171106
This was a surprisingly awesome episode. I loved how each person
recognized who the real Clark was. The dystopian world was pretty
lame, although I love that Clark Luthor has been converted to
good. Tess looked really beautiful and I felt a bit bad for
her. I'm excited to be coming to the end of the story.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Movie: The Secret of Kells, by Tomm Moore (2009)
entry.content:
Movie: The Secret of Kells, by Tomm Moore (2009)20171105
This was a really cool movie! It was so visually interesting and
the story was nice and subtle. I'm amazed at how short it was, yet
how powerful! Great job!
  • Movies
  • 2009

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 11 - Icarus
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 11 - Icarus20171104
I enjoyed this one, especially how active Lois was in the plot. I
think that they have presented the Phantom Zone as being too
dangerous in this rendition of Superman... it feels more like a
death sentence than in other versions.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 12 - Collateral
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 12 - Collateral20171104
This was, although too much like The Matrix, very cool. It is
really nice to have Chloe back and it was especially cool to have
her in control of the Suicide Squad... that's so Chloe.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 13 - Beacon
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 13 - Beacon20171104
The interaction of Lionel-2, new-Lex, and Tess is really great. I
loved the ending reveal. I think that I am too cynical about
government to believe the fairy tale of the VRA being repealed
and that being meaningful, but whatever. I can buy into it being
a good step for the heroes.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 7 - Ambush
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 7 - Ambush20171103
I like the home-y-ness of this episode. In particular, it was
nice to have Lucy return and do some hijinks. I thought that the
conclusion of the episode was pretty weak though, because all the
actually was basically pointless.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 8 - Abandoned
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 8 - Abandoned20171103
This episode was CRAZY. All the scenes with Tess were really
interesting and it was cool to have her history come back and be
actually cool. I don't like how there was no resolution to the
story though... what happened with the Granny? Why didn't Tess
and Clark stop her and free the girls after they got out? I hope
that little girl isn't still stuck in the closet.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 9 - Patriot
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 9 - Patriot20171103
This episode had high drama but also a lot of pointless
activity. I'm glad that they understand Darkseid as a threat and
that Lois will be slightly less angsty.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 10 - Luthor
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 10 - Episode 10 - Luthor20171103
This was another really awesome episode, front to back. It was
kind of awesome to have Tess and Clark be a thing in the other
universe. I'm surprised that Clark would not have tried harder to
right things in that world, given that he feels responsible for
everything.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville
